channel.title: instrospection on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in instrospection on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Writing paralysis
item.description: I think twitter and facebook stunt my writing. The more that I read tweets, the more self-conscious I get when I write. Not that my writing is all that original, but I still feel that it is something that comes from me. I worry so much about presenting ideas of others as my own without even remembering that I had seen the ideas before. In the old days, the things that I read were long form.
